title: Are there different kinds of morality? - Quora

response.answer_text: Morality is a term use and defined by human beings and a select group of more or less intelligent animals. As every human being is different, so is our definition of morality obviously, though it can be argued that some sort of singular base definition exists. If we are to consider the term morality as it appear among humans in real life, we arrive at the opposite conclusion. In the end the answer likely depends on the context in which the question appear.
